fi.tamk.tiko.engine.gui

Class Screen

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.tamk.tiko.engine.gui.Screen

  • public abstract class Screen
extends java.lang.Object
    Screen contains canvas where objects are drawn. Screen has canvas for drawing. It also has camera used to draw objects to right place in game screen.
    Since:
    1.8
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jani Timonen
